HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_IceDart.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Dardos de Gelo podem ser usados para congelar certos monstros.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_FireDart.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Dardos de Fogo podem ser usados para incendiar certos monstros.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Acid.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Dardos Ácidos podem ser usados para dissolver correntes de metal e ferir monstros.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BladeOfOsiris.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A poderosa espada que um dia foi empunhada pelo grande deus Osíris.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BronzeScarab.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Moeda padrão que pode ser usada para comprar vários itens diferentes.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_WingsOfIbis.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um artefato antigo que concede a habilidade de pular uma segunda vez no meio do ar.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Blowpipe.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma poderosa arma e ferramenta que lança dardos mágicos em alvos remotos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_CrocodileScales.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um artefato mágico que o permite nadar debaixo d'água com maior velocidade.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_UnderwaterProjectile.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Estes projéteis se regeneram magicamente e nunca se esgotam. Podem ser usados para atingir alvos e certos monstros enquanto estiver nadando debaixo d'água.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HandsOfAmun.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um artefato antigo que dá a você força para empurrar objetos extremamente pesados.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_ScarabPurse.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Esta bolsa pode guardar até 400 Káraves de Ouro.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_ScarabPurse2.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Esta bolsa pode guardar até 900 Káraves de Ouro.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BeetlePouch.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Este saquinho pode guardar até 20 Besouros de Captura e até 10 Monstros Capturados de cada tipo.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_DartBelt.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Este cinto pode guardar até 50 dardos de cada tipo.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BeetleStachel.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Esta bolsa pode guardar até 50 Besouros de Captura e até 10 Monstros Capturados de cada tipo.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HandsOfAmunRa.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Te permitem empurrar até mesmo o mais pesado dos objetos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_ShieldOfOsiris.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>O escudo mágico usado em batalhas pelo grande deus Osíris.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_CloakOfInvisibility.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Esta pedra mágica garante ao usuário o poder da invisibilidade... e morte instantânea!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AnkhContainer.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A essência da vida: cada Ankh de Ouro adicional aumenta sua capacidade de saúde.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AnkhPiece.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>4 pedaços de Ankh de Ouro podem ser convertidos em um Ankh de Ouro completo por alguém com as habilidades certas.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_CanopicVase.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um vaso sagrado que contém um fragmento da alma de Tutancâmon.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Pearl.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um diamante azul que pertence ao mestre do Corredor dos Campeões. Devolva-o para provar que é digno do desafio das paredes.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Herbs.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Ervas medicinais para curar o Prefeito.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BookOfTheDead.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Livro que contém encantamentos para enviar Ces-To ao Castelo de Uruk com Vasos Canópicos para a Múmia.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_CaptureBeetle.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Besouros que podem ser usados para capturar monstros.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_StandardDart.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Estes dardos se regeneram magicamente, criando um estoque infinito. Possuem força suficiente apenas para ferir monstros explosivos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BounceDart.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Estes dardos se regeneram magicamente, criando um estoque infinito. Eles rebatem superfícies para acertar alvos indiretamente, mas possuem força suficiente apenas para ferir monstros explosivos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PhysNote.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma nota do Doutor para Kemmet, o Inventor.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BC01_Giant_Prawn.message:
Estes guerreiros da Rainha Geb têm um tamanho imenso e são crueis...

Boa sorte a qualquer um que encare um destes em combate.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BM09_Smiling_burble.message:
Um membro excêntrico da espécie Borbulha que usa seus chifres para atacar...

Seus chapéus de tecido já foram usados por tantas gerações, que agora crescem em suas cabeças desde o nascimento.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BM10_i_Cyclops.message:
These elusive critters shoot a powerful ray of fire from their single eye, and are able to teleport over short distances...

When injured, the Cyclops will split into two - double the danger.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BM12_slim_burble.message:
Possui um mecanismo de defesa suicida que envolve criar um impulso explosivo antes de se lançar contra sua vítima e explodir...

Isso pode ser vantajoso quando soltar Borbulhas Esguias capturadas em direção a obstáculos.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BR04_Goofy_Lizard.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Desde o momento em que nascem, os Lagartos Patetas são desastrados, esquecidos mas de boa índole. É conhecido por passar horas atacando a própria sombra.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BR06_Half_Brute.message:
The name Half Brute understates the nature of these aggressive two-legged monsters...

While their unwieldy gait makes them slow, they are capable of stomping the ground with enough force to send a powerful shockwave into all those around.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BU02_Skeletal_Axeman.message:
Watch out for these undead axe-wielding warriors...

They can use their weapon as a boomerang, and can even call upon a protective shield which encases them until their axe returns.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BU05_almost_a_bull.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Almost-A-Bull is named so not only for the two horns atop its head, but also for its unnerving habit of charging and attacking anyone wearing the color red.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_BU06_MBird.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>They may be undead, but they're definitely unfriendly. Will swoop down beak first into anything they perceive as a threat.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_FL02_Featherless_Turkey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Featherless Turkey is aptly named for its total lack of plumage. Widely regarded as a delicacy at any feast during the winter season.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_FL03_shuttlecock_bird.message:
The Shuttlecock Bird may be one-legged, but it's quick on its foot...

When hurtling through the air to attack it resembles an arrow, and can cause as much damage.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_FL05_Mummy_Eagle.message: The Mummy Eagle is one of the largest birds around. Undead, they are even more resilient to their live counterparts from attack.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HD02_Cat.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Knives Cats quickly confuse opponents with deft leaps and bounds, before plunging in to attack with alarming speed, razor sharp claws fully extended.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HD14_Crab.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Crabhands attack their enemies with sharp claws in a somewhat cumbersome fashion. Let it get close enough, however, and expect painful results.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HD17_Sharpbeak.message:
Sharpbeaks carry a sword in each hand which they wield with disorientating and discerning skill...

Infamous for slowly but surely bearing down on their opponent, utilizing the Florentine dual rapier method to deadly effect.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HD43_Skull_Aka_Worshippe.message:
Skull Worshippers use their flaming staffs and ability to summon ghostly flying skulls to deadly effect...

Encounter one of these and the forces of evil are bound to be close by.

Able to pass through solid forms, they move with the swiftness of a winter cloud and attack as if from nowhere...

Save projectile weaponry for elsewhere, as they will pass straight through the Dark Worshipper.

In addition to their well-honed swordsmanship, they are capable of releasing an evil, shimmering skull that chases down an opponent...

A flurry of blows often fails to harm them, such is their defensive skill.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_IN01_Green_Giant_worm.message:
They rear up out of their holes with alarming speed, using their great mass to slam down, crushing anything beneath...

Known to be impervious to anything that might stun smaller monsters.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_IN07_Blade_Scorpion.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Blade Scorpion is quick on its feet and quicker to attack. Be wary of its tail, and the darkened hidey holes it favors for sleeping.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_IN08_Tacked_Spider.message:
The Tacked Spider likes to hang around all sorts of places...

Keep an eye out on the ceilings of any cavernous tunnel in case one drops down from above.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_IN09_Sak_Spike_Spider.message:
Jumps and clings to its prey, biting away with exceptional persistence until either shaken off or well fed...

Encounter one and others are sure to be close by, as they hunt in groups.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_IN11_Spider.message:
An arthropod with the ability to move swiftly along vertical and horizontal surfaces...

The vicious fangs are not the only thing to fear; each of its legs ends in lethal, dagger-like claws.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PI01_Piranha.message:
The way they walk may look comical, but their bite certainly isn't. Vicious on land and in water...

Their unique metabolism makes them impervious to cold conditions.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PI01_Hard_Piranha.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Exo-Piranha is a new evolutionary strain of Piranha. Only discovered in recent years, they are faster and stronger than others of their species.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PI02_Electric_Eel.message:
A snakelike fish capable of emitting electric charges.

Electric Eels are aggressive and territorial creatures, and in large quantities have been known to electrify vast areas of water.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PI03_Aka_Manta_Rays.message:
A large, edible marine fish noted for its flat body And graceful swimming style.

Years of being a culinary delicacy have made this creature understandably wary of anything unfamilar which strays too close to it.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PI04_Aka_Spinefish.message:
Fast-swimming and highly protective of its domain, the Spinefish is often a favored choice of the upper classes to make their moats even more hazardous to trespassers.

Moving with great ease, they often attack their prey before they've even been spotted.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PL02_Tree_Creature.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Tree Creature may possess a beautiful magical ability, but let the phosphorescent glow enchant you and you'll get a nasty surprise from below.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PL04_Sunflower_With_Face.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Sunflower is not as peaceful as it may sound. Get hit by any one of the spores it emits and you won't be sleeping well that night.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QC01_Pokemon.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Slow, timid and unthreatening, Shell Critters are of little use. The bourgeoisie are known to use their shells as ornamentation.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QR01_Cobra.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Cobra is a venomous hooded snake which resides in trees and other plant life. Disturb a Cobra's home and it will not hesitate to rear its head and attack the intruder.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QR02_Sak_Spitting_Toad.message:
Despite its overbearing size, the Spitting Toad is a placid creature renowned for its soft spot for coconuts.

Spitting Toads have been known to assist adventurers who feed them this nutty delicacy.

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QR03_Sak_Small_Frog.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>This frog may well be small, but it isn't the friendliest creature around. Indiginous to swamplands, they're noxious little critters.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QR04_Sak_Nose_Needler.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Nose Needler is a burrowing mammal found in dusty regions. Good luck to anyone attempting to land a blow on one of these evasive mammals.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU01_Skeletal_Spider.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Known for using its head's unique height to headbutt their prey. Once knocked unconscious, the Skeletal Spider can devour its prey at leisure.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU02_Skeletal_Armadillo.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>When alerted to a potential threat they will spin faster and faster on the spot, before dashing headlong into their enemy.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU02_Skeletal_Armadillo_.message:
Employing the same spinning and charging attack as the Skeletal Armadillo, the Skeletal Fire Armadillo also generates a ball of fire, damaging any opponents with scorching results...

Captured ones can be used to burn down wooden obstacles.
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Skeletal Electric Armadillo spins on the spot, building up an electric charge shocking to anything that comes into contact with it.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU04_Mummy_Chihuahua.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>These little dogs are none too pleased about being mummified, so try not to get close. If you make that mistake, expect them to cling to you and bite away until they are shaken off.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU05_skeletal_waspspider.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Aranha Vespa representa uma ameaça com suas afiadas garras frontais, que cortam o vento... e sua presa.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU06_Mummy_Worm.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>As they are rooted to the spot they cannot see in every direction. Get behind one and, to all intents and purposes, it is completely harmless.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU09_Rat.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma criatura irritante que não desiste de uma perseguição até ter fincado seus dentes em algo. Mais comumente encontrada vivendo ao redor de áreas populadas.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_QU08_Normal_Chihuahua.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>O Chihuahua é um cão de pelagem macia e baixa estatura. Apesar de serem altamente respeitados pela comunidade amante dos cães, a maioria das pessoas acham seu latido constante extremamente irritante.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HD03_BigBull.message:
The Big Bull would perhaps be more accurately described as a "big bully"...

It cannot be reasoned with, and will persistently swing and smash its hammer at anything it feels like bothering. Do not get in the way!

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Lux_Palace_Be.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Chave para o Pátio do palácio.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Lux_Palace_Sa.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Chave que abre sarcófagos mágicos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Lux_Palace_Am.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Amuletos antigos encontrados no Palácio de Luxor.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Lux_Palace_Co.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Chave para o Pátio do palácio.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Lux_Palace_Tr.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Chave para a Sala do Tesouro do palácio.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Mum_Imp2_Plan.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Chave Solar do Planetário na sala central.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Chave Terrestre do Planetário na sala central.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Chave Lunar do Planetário na sala central.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Basket.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Ces-To é um objeto mágico capaz de transportar itens entre Sphinx e a Múmia após você obter o Livro dos Mortos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AbyPass.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Passe de Identificação de Abydos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AbyPearls.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Pérolas lindas e raras, encontradas apenas em Abydos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_RosettaStonePiece.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Fragmentos da Pedra de Roseta.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_RosettaStone.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Pedra de Roseta, que permite a tradução de textos antigos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Sak_Crown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Coroa Sagrada de Uruk.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Aby_Crown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Coroa Sagrada de Abydos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Hel_Crown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Coroa Sagrada de Heliópolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Set_Crown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A Coroa Sagrada de Set.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Hel_PharaohIn.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um convite para ver o Faraó de Heliópolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Hel_BeetleBre.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma jarra grande usada para criar besouros.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Cartão Fidelidade que garante a você metade do preço em besouros na loja do Povoado de Bedouin.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CageKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A chave para a jaula do Urukite.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_MummyMoney.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Moeda rara encontrada somente no Castelo de Uruk.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Mum_OldKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A chave de um sótão antigo.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Mum_GlyphKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma chave hieróglifa de ouro.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_PalaceInvite.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um convite para ver o Faraó de Heliópolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica associada à deusa Nut, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica da felicidade terrena, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone03.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica associada à fertilidade, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone04.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica considerada mais forte que a espada, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone05.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica de origens proféticas, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone06.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica da grande casa, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone07.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica de proteção e vigilância, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_CurseStone08.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra mágica de proteção e vigilância, capaz de quebrar a maior das maldições.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_PortalAmulet_.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um Amuleto de Portal com símbolos estranhos indicando transporte para um lugar misterioso.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um Amuleto de Portal com símbolos oceânicos indicando transporte para Abydos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um Amuleto de Portal com símbolos gravados em areia indicando transporte para Heliópolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um Amuleto de Portal com símbolos antigos indicando transporte para a Torre de Anúbis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_GlyphKey01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um hieróglifo de ouro que se encaixa em certos pedestais.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_GlyphKey02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um hieróglifo de ouro que se encaixa em certos pedestais.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_HeliopolisGat.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A chave para o portão do Deserto Sul de Heliópolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A chave para o portão do Grande Obelisco de Heliópolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A chave para uma porta de pedra em uma caverna entre o Ponto de Heliópolis e a Praia do Sul.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Item_Quest_Bone01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>O crânio de um Esqueleto Guerreiro.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HippyItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Essa Sombrinha é ideal para se proteger do sol.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Coconut.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Cocos são a comida favorita do sapo de lava de Uruk. Os sapos de lava são conhecidos por ajudarem aventureiros em troca dessas preciosas iguarias.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_ZipLineHook.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma alça desmontável que o permite usar as tirolesas.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_DummyItem.message: OBJETO FICTÍCIO QUE NUNCA DEVERÁ SER ADICIONADO AO INVENTÁRIO DO JOGADOR

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AbyStairsKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>A chave para as escadas do pátio, que dão acesso aos Canais de Abydos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_MedicineBag.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma sacola feita especialmente para preservar ingredientes medicinais delicados.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AtunStatue.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma estátua de ouro do deus Atun. Dizem ser a única forma de quebrar o Selo mágico de Atun.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_HathorStatue.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma estátua de ouro do deus Hathor, imbuída com poderes mágicos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Jewel01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma das joias roubadas do Museu de Abydos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_EagleStone.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Uma pedra encantada que o permite invocar uma Grande Águia em locais específicos.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_AtunEye.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um olho de pedra que parece se encaixar na cavidade ocular de algum tipo de estátua.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Medal_Shoot.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um impressionante medalhão provando que você é um verdadeiro mestre com a Zarabatana.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Medal_Walls.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um impressionante medalhão provando que você é o Campeão dos Corredores.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Medal_Pairs.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um impressionante medalhão provando que você completou o jogo da Memória.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Medal_Simon.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um impressionante medalhão provando que você completou o jogo de Sequências.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Museum_Certificate.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um certificado do Museu de Abydos presenteado a você após ter completado a coleção de História Natural do museu.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Museum_HunterA.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um certificado do Museu de Abydos presenteado a você por doar 30 monstros.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_Inv_Dsc_Museum_HunterB.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Um certificado do Museu de Abydos presenteado a você por doar 20 monstros.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
